description: This file is a React component file (TSX) for the frontend of a web application, defining layout and import configurations for the app using the Remix framework. It includes setup for links, metadata, and the main application layout.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external stylesheets and preconnect links for fonts.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that sets up the HTML structure, including head metadata and body content.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component that renders the current route's outlet.
